name: Fishvival [Trijam #93]
description:
Controls:

A/D or directional arrows (left and right) to move

Space bar to jump (Press it more that once)

The goal is to get as many food as you can, avoiding junk.

Hope you enjoy the short experience and the final message.

PS: Sorry if my english is not the best, I'm not native. I wish the final message could be better, but anyways, I think the message I'm trying to share it's easy to get.

This was my first videogame! For the Trijam #93 . Made it in three hours and 30 minutes (Almost...)

Assets:

Food sound: https://freesound.org/people/MATRIXXX_/sounds/402767/

Junk sound:

https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270326/

Font used:

https://www.1001fonts.com/arcadeclassic-font.html

Rest of assets made by me

Thank you.
